게니우스 로키

A 게니우스 로키 is difficult to 감지, since it looks like any other section of landscape. A 게니우스 로키 itself has no 지능, but rather “emulates” the sentience of any creature it currently 노예화 (see below), if any.  Each 게니우스 로키 has only a single enslaved creature at one time, though other creatures may also inhabit the surface of the 게니우스 로키. Any creature entering a 게니우스 로키 who makes a successful 생존 check (DC 31) realizes that something is amiss, though it is difficult to tell exactly what. 게니우스 로키 do not 말하기 directly, though they may do so through their currently enslaved thrall.

전투

COMBAT

A 게니우스 로키 can directly 공격 any creature standing on its surface with animated parts of itself, delivering slam 공격. It also directs its enslaved thrall against those it 공격. If its slave is slain, it selects another of its foes as its next, newest slave. Once a 게니우스 로키 animates a portion of itself to 공격 the boundaries of its form become clear, and the creature becomes open to 공격 (생존 checks to determine the extent of the 게니우스 로키 are no longer necessary). The animated part of the 게니우스 로키 has a reach of 15 feet.

노예화 (Su): A 게니우스 로키 can use the 에픽 spell 노예화 once per round as a free action until it successfully 노예화 a foe (Will DC 53 to resist). The DC is 매력-based. Once it has a slave, it cannot 노예화 another until its current slave dies, is imprisoned, or is otherwise incapaticiated. A slave becomes free if its 게니우스 로키 master is slain. A 게니우스 로키 forces its slave to remain with it, though it may send its slave off to temporarily visit nearby locations in order to draw in unsuspecting victims. In fact, the “목적” of the 게니우스 로키 are to some degree influenced by the current slave. The 게니우스 로키 has no 지능 score of its own; thus, its emulation of its slave’s 지능 sometimes transfers attitudes and goals. However, a slave can only go so far in influencing its mobile master, and cannot knowingly attempt to free itself from the 게니우스 로키 that keeps it close.

Improved Grab (Ex): If the 게니우스 로키 hits a Gargantuan or smaller creature with a slam 공격, it deals normal 피해 and attempts to start a 드잡이 as a free action without provoking an 공격 of opportunity. The 게니우스 로키 has the option to conduct the 드잡이 normally, or simply use the part of its body it used in the improved grab to hold the opponent. Each successful 드잡이 check it makes during successive rounds automatically deals slam 공격 피해, in addition to constriction 피해.

Constrict (Ex): A 게니우스 로키 crushes its opponent, dealing 4d10+30 points of bludgeoning 피해, after making a successful 드잡이 check.

늪괴물 Traits: An 늪괴물 is an amorphous or mutable creature. 늪괴물 are immune to 독, 수면, 마비, stunning, and polymorphing. They have no clear front or back and are therefore not subject to critical hits or 협공. 늪괴물 are blind but have the blindsight special quality. They have no 지능 scores and are therefore immune to all mind-affecting effects (charms, compulsions, phantasms, patterns, and morale effects).

A 횡설수설 구슬 can 말하기 all languages.

A 횡설수설 구슬’s natural 무기 are treated as 에픽 for the 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

전투

COMBAT

The 횡설수설 구슬 has the ability to bite its foes by extending a pseudopod with one of its mouths protruding from the end. The orb can extend four of these at any one foe, or a total of twelve in any given round. At the same time, the legions of eyes have the ability to cast a host of 주문 at a rapid rate.

Gibbering (Su): The cacophony of speech emanating from the scores of mouths that make up the orb forces all within 60 feet of the creature to succeed at a Will save each round (DC 40) or suffer the effects of an 광기 spell.

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, the 횡설수설 구슬 must hit with a bite 공격. If it gets a hold, the orb automatically deals bite 피해 and can attempt to swallow whole.

Swallow Whole (Ex): A 횡설수설 구슬 can attempt to swallow a Large or smaller opponent by making a successful 드잡이 check. Once inside, the opponent takes 4d8 points of constriction 피해 plus 3d10 points of acid 피해 per round. A swallowed creature can cut its way out by using claws or a 빛 slashing weapon to deal 20 points of 피해 in a single blow (AC 16, DR 10/에픽 still applies). Once the creature exits, the fluidlike body structure of the orb closes the wound; other swallowed opponents must cut their own way out. When a creature dies by being swallowed whole (or when a creature killed by the 횡설수설 구슬 in some other fashion is eaten by it), the 횡설수설 구슬 absorbs the creature’s known 주문, prepared 주문, and spell-like 능력. The orb can use any two of those 능력 per round as a free action. Each originates from an eye that is not producing an eye ray (see below) that round. Stolen 주문 and spell-like 능력 are lost after 24 hours.

Eye 광선 (Su): Two dozen of the eyes can each produce a magical ray each round, with each eye emulating a spell from among the list of 주문 below as if cast by a 27th-레벨 caster. The save DCs, where applicable, are 16 + spell 레벨. A 횡설수설 구슬 has no directional limitations on where it can point its eye 광선, because the eyes orbiting around its body drift and 부유 wherever needed. However, a 횡설수설 구슬 can never aim more than five 광선 at any single target, due to limitations of aiming. All 광선 have a 거리 of 150 feet. Each of these effects functions as a ray, regardless of the normal parameters of the spell it resembles. That is, each is usable against a single target and requires a ranged touch 공격. The eye 광선 are: 냉기 돌풍, 분해, 몬스터 지배, 정령 흡수, 정신박약, 죽음의 손가락, 살에서 돌로, 상급 dispelling, 해악, 몬스터 포박, 지독한 고사, 파열, 치명적인 상처 가하기, 번개 화살, 마법 화살, 마법사의 분열, 춤의 유혹, 객체 변이, 권능의 말씀 눈멃, 권능의 말씀 죽음, 권능의 말씀 기절, 무지갯빛 분사, 처단, and 시간 동결.

Spell-Like 능력: At will—Two stolen 주문 or spell-like 능력 per round. 시전자 레벨 27th, save DC 16 + spell 레벨.

All-Around 시야 (Ex): The 횡설수설 구슬’s many eyes give it a +4 racial bonus on 감지 and 탐색 checks.

Flight (Ex): The 횡설수설 구슬’s body is naturally buoyant. This buoyancy allows it to 비행 as the spell, as a free action, at a 속도 of 20 feet. This buoyancy also grants it a permanent 깃털 낙하 effect with personal 거리.

Amorphous (Ex): A 횡설수설 구슬 is not subject to critical hits. It has no clear front or back, so it cannot be flanked.

미스랄 골렘

MITHRAL GOLEM

A 미스랄 골렘 cannot 말하기 or make any vocal noise, nor does it have any distinguishable odor. Unlike most 골렘, it can 달리기 just as well as a normal creature.

A 미스랄 골렘’s natural 무기 are treated as 에픽 for the 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

전투

Combat

Alacrity (Su): Once per round, the 미스랄 골렘 may take an extra standard action (either before or after its other actions in the round).

Magic Immunity (Ex): A 미스랄 골렘 is immune to all magical and supernatural effects, except as follows. A 감속화 spell negates its alacrity for 1d4 rounds, while a 가속 spell restores 1d6 히트 포인트 per 레벨 of the caster (maximum 10d6) or restores its alacrity, if previously negated by a 감속화 spell. Multiple 감속화 주문 simply extend the 지속시간 of the effect.

제작

Construction

A 미스랄 골렘’s body is sculpted from 8 1/2 tons of pure iron and is then polymorphed into mithral (using 변이 any object). A 미스랄 골렘 costs 250,000 gold pieces to create, which includes 5,000 gp for the body. Assembling the body requires a successful 제작 (armorsmithing) or 제작 (weaponsmithing) check (DC 30). The creator must be 25th 레벨, have the 에픽 마법 무기와 갑옷 제작 feat, and be able to cast 비전 주문. Completing the ritual drains 5,000 XP from the creator and requires 기아스/임무, 가속, and wish.

Magic Immunity (Ex): An 아다만틴 골렘 is immune to all magical and supernatural effects.

An 아다만틴 골렘’s body is sculpted from 45,000 pounds of pure iron and is then polymorphed into adamantine (using 변이 any object). The 골렘 costs 500,000 gold pieces to create, which includes 25,000 gp for the body. Assembling the body requires a successful 제작 (armorsmithing) or 제작 (weaponsmithing) check (DC 40). The creator must be 30th 레벨, have the 에픽 마법 무기와 갑옷 제작 feat, and be able to cast 비전 주문. Completing the ritual drains 10,000 XP from the creator and requires 짓누르는 손, 기아스/임무, and wish.
